tool.name: web_search
tool.description:
Search the web using Firecrawl and AI synthesis for real-time information.
This is your PRIMARY research tool. It performs a live search, scrapes the most relevant pages, and synthesizes the findings to answer your question. Use it for: - Current vulnerabilities, CVEs, and security advisories - Latest attack techniques, exploits, and proof-of-concepts - Technology-specific documentation and configuration - Target reconnaissance and OSINT - Finding specific tools or libraries
The tool gathers raw content from the web and processes it to give you a highly technical, verified answer.
tool.details: This tool leverages Firecrawl to perform deep searches and retrieve full page content (Markdown), which is then analyzed by a Large Language Model to provide a precise answer. It is superior to standard search because it reads the actual documentation/articles rather than just snippets.

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: The search query. Be specific and include relevant technical terms, version numbers, or context. (e.g., 'CVE-2024-1234 exploit poc', 'bypass Cloudflare WAF 2024 techniques', 'nginx 1.18.0 vulnerabilities')

returns.description: Response containing: - success: Whether the search was successful - query: The original query - content: Synthesized answer based on the search results - message: Status message
